name: Quality Control
storyline: Before a game hits the stores, it must be tested, tested and tested again... So here is a bunch of games that we would like you to test for us ! In Quality Control you are task to take on the job of a beta tester : find the bugs, report them and then fix them ! Don't think it will be easy. It's a full time job you know !
summary: In this game YOU are the beta tester. Explore the levels. Find the bugs. And fix them !
